trans-unit.source: Export restrictions on cryptography
trans-unit.target: Export restrictions on cryptography

trans-unit.source: Use this info to determine if your app uses cryptography in a way that might prevent it from being listed in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Use this info to determine if your app uses cryptography in a way that might prevent it from being listed in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: Export restrictions on cryptography
trans-unit.target: Export restrictions on cryptography

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Use this info to determine if your app uses cryptography in a way that might prevent it from being listed in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Use this info to determine if your app uses cryptography in a way that might prevent it from being listed in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: The Bureau of Industry and Security in the United States Department of Commerce regulates the export of technology that uses certain types of encryption.
trans-unit.target: The Bureau of Industry and Security in the United States Department of Commerce regulates the export of technology that uses certain types of encryption.

trans-unit.source: All apps listed in the Windows Store must comply with these laws and regulations because the app files can be stored in the United States.
trans-unit.target: All apps listed in the Windows Store must comply with these laws and regulations because the app files can be stored in the United States.

trans-unit.source: Even apps that are uploaded by app developers from other countries for distribution outside of the United States must comply with these regulations.
trans-unit.target: Even apps that are uploaded by app developers from other countries for distribution outside of the United States must comply with these regulations.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, when submitting an app to the Windows Store, all app developers must make sure that their apps don't contain any technology that is restricted by these regulations.
trans-unit.target: Consequently, when submitting an app to the Windows Store, all app developers must make sure that their apps don't contain any technology that is restricted by these regulations.

trans-unit.source: **Note** The information provided here provides some guidance, but it is your responsibility as the app developer who is publishing apps in the Windows Store to make sure that your app complies with all applicable laws and regulations.
trans-unit.target: **Note** The information provided here provides some guidance, but it is your responsibility as the app developer who is publishing apps in the Windows Store to make sure that your app complies with all applicable laws and regulations.

trans-unit.source: For more info about the U.S. Department of Commerce and the Bureau of Industry and Security, see [About the Bureau of Industry and Security](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245644).
trans-unit.target: For more info about the U.S. Department of Commerce and the Bureau of Industry and Security, see [About the Bureau of Industry and Security](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245644).

trans-unit.source: For info about the Export Administration Regulations (EAR) that govern the export of technology that includes encryption, see [EAR Controls for Items That Use Encryption](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245645).
trans-unit.target: For info about the Export Administration Regulations (EAR) that govern the export of technology that includes encryption, see [EAR Controls for Items That Use Encryption](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245645).

trans-unit.source: Governed uses
trans-unit.target: Governed uses

trans-unit.source: First, determine if your app uses a type of cryptography that is governed by the Export Administration Regulations.
trans-unit.target: First, determine if your app uses a type of cryptography that is governed by the Export Administration Regulations.

trans-unit.source: The question includes the examples shown in the list here; but remember that this list doesn't include every possible application of cryptography.
trans-unit.target: The question includes the examples shown in the list here; but remember that this list doesn't include every possible application of cryptography.

trans-unit.source: **Important** Consider not only the code you wrote for your app, but also all the software libraries, utilities and operating system components that your app includes or links to.
trans-unit.target: **Important** Consider not only the code you wrote for your app, but also all the software libraries, utilities and operating system components that your app includes or links to.

trans-unit.source: Any use of a digital signature, such as authentication or integrity checking
trans-unit.target: Any use of a digital signature, such as authentication or integrity checking

trans-unit.source: Encryption of any data or files that your app uses or accesses
trans-unit.target: Encryption of any data or files that your app uses or accesses

trans-unit.source: Key management, certificate management, or anything that interacts with a public key infrastructure
trans-unit.target: Key management, certificate management, or anything that interacts with a public key infrastructure

trans-unit.source: Using a secure communication channel such as NTLM, Kerberos, Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), or Transport Layer Security (TLS)
trans-unit.target: Using a secure communication channel such as NTLM, Kerberos, Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), or Transport Layer Security (TLS)

trans-unit.source: Encrypting passwords or other forms of information security
trans-unit.target: Encrypting passwords or other forms of information security

trans-unit.source: Copy protection or digital rights management (DRM)
trans-unit.target: Copy protection or digital rights management (DRM)

trans-unit.source: Antivirus protection
trans-unit.target: Antivirus protection

trans-unit.source: For the complete and current list of cryptographic applications, see [EAR Controls for Items That Use Encryption](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245645).
trans-unit.target: For the complete and current list of cryptographic applications, see [EAR Controls for Items That Use Encryption](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245645).

trans-unit.source: Non-restricted uses
trans-unit.target: Non-restricted uses

trans-unit.source: Note that some of the applications of cryptography are not restricted.
trans-unit.target: Note that some of the applications of cryptography are not restricted.

trans-unit.source: Here are the unrestricted tasks:
trans-unit.target: Here are the unrestricted tasks:

trans-unit.source: Password encryption
trans-unit.target: Password encryption

trans-unit.source: Copy protection
trans-unit.target: Copy protection

trans-unit.source: Authentication
trans-unit.target: Authentication

trans-unit.source: Digital rights management
trans-unit.target: Digital rights management

trans-unit.source: Using digital signatures
trans-unit.target: Using digital signatures

trans-unit.source: For the complete and current list of cryptographic applications, see [EAR Controls for Items That Use Encryption](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245645).
trans-unit.target: For the complete and current list of cryptographic applications, see [EAR Controls for Items That Use Encryption](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245645).

trans-unit.source: If your app calls, supports, contains, or uses cryptography or encryption for any task that is not in this list, it needs an Export Commodity Classification Number (ECCN).
trans-unit.target: If your app calls, supports, contains, or uses cryptography or encryption for any task that is not in this list, it needs an Export Commodity Classification Number (ECCN).

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an ECCN, see [ECCN Questions and Answers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245646).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an ECCN, see [ECCN Questions and Answers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=245646).
